COLLECT_ACTION_SPEAK_CLEAR: Speak collect element content (separately) and clear afterwards
COLLECT_ACTION_SPEAK_CONTINUOUS_CLEAR: Speak collect element content (continuously) and clear afterwards
CONFIRM_IMPORT_BACKUP: Caution: This action will delete the existing configuration and replace it with the data from file "{0}". Continue?
CONFIRM_DELETE_GRID: Do you really want to delete the grid "{0}"?
CONFIRM_DELETE_DICT: Do you really want to delete the dictionary "{0}"?
CONFIRM_RESET_DB: Do you really want to reset to default configuration? All current grids will be deleted!
CONFIRM_DELETE_ALL_ELEMS: Do you really want to delete all elements of the current grid?
CONFIRM_REMOVE_USER: Do you really want to unlink user "{0}"? This will not delete the user itself, but all data of the user stored on this device.
CONFIRM_REMOVE_USER_LOCAL: Do you really want to delete user "{0}"? Since the user is not synchronized this action will permanently delete the user.
ERROR_CODE_UNAUTHORIZED: Login failed, wrong username or password.
ERROR_CODE_NETWORK_ERROR: Login failed (network error), please try again later.
VALIDATION_ERROR_REGEX: Имя пользователя должно содержать только строчные буквы, цифры или символы ["-", "_"], допустимая длина - 3-16 символов.
automaticallyCloseTimeoutInSeconds: Automatically close timeout in seconds (0 = never), currently only works in Firefox
insertLabelsForNewElements: Insert Labels for new elements, separated by ";" or [Enter]
wrapAroundJumpToFirstElementAfterLastEle: Wrap around (jump to first element after last element)
goToStartPositionAfterSelect: Go to start position after select
couldNotLoadModelFromAre: Could not load Model from ARE!
uploadTheSavedModelOrDownloadCurrent: Upload the saved model or download current ARE model in order to define the action.
downloadTheCurrentAreModelInOrderToDefin: Download the current ARE model in order to define the action.
label: Label
preventMouseClickOnYoutubePlayer: Запретить клик мыши на проигрывателе YouTube
moveAllElementsToThisGrid: Переместить все элементы в эту сетку
huffmanInputMethod2OrMoreInputEvents: Huffman input method: 2 or more input events
timeoutInMs0MeansDisabled: Время ожидания в мс (0 означает отключено)
insertWordsSeparatedBySpaceEnter: Insert Words, separated by space. ";" or [Enter]
wantToRegisterAnOnlineUser: Want to register an online user?
aGlobalGridIsShownWithinEachOtherGridAnd: A global grid is shown within each other grid and can contain elements like e.g. "back" or "home".
moreWordsAvailableTypeInSearchFieldToFil: доступно больше слов. Введите поле поиска для фильтра.
moreWordsForThisFilterRefineSearchToShow: more word(s) for this filter. Refine search to show more.
noWordsForThisFilterClearSearchField: Для этого фильтра нет слов. Очистите поле поиска, чтобы показать элементы.
rememberThisUserAndMakeItAvailableForOff: Запомнить этого пользователя и сделать его доступным для оффлайн использования
doNotCheckForAOnetimeLoginOnForeign: Не проверяйте одноразовый вход на чужом устройстве.
astericsGridIsFreeAndAllYouNeedToRegiste: AsTeRICS Grid is free and all you need to register is a username and a password.
yourPasswordWillBeUsedInOrderToEncrypt: Ваш пароль будет использоваться для шифрования ваших личных данных перед синхронизацией с облаком. Более сильный пароль означает лучшее шифрование.
rememberThisUserAndMakeItAvailableForOff: Запомнить этого пользователя и сделать его доступным для оффлайн использования
doNotCheckIfYouAreUsingAForeignDevice: Не проверяйте, если используете ли вы другое устройство.
synchronizeNavigationAndLockedState: Synchronize navigation and locked/fullscreen state for online users
passcodeForUnlockingUserInterface: Passcode for unlocking user interface (only numbers)
idealForUsingOnASingleDevice: ideal for using on a single device
itsAlwaysPossibleToRegisterLater: it's always possible to register later.
allGridsAreSavedOfflineAndOnline: all grids are saved offline and online
automaticSynchronizationAcrossMultipleDe: automatic synchronization across multiple devices (e.g. PC, tablet, smartphone)
allDataIsEndtoendEncryptedAndOnlyYouAreA: all data is end-to-end encrypted and only you are able to access it
forRegistrationOnlyAUsernameAndAPassword: for registration only a username and a password is needed
disabledIfHoldDurationIsSet: disabled if hold duration is set.
noSelectedRadioStationsUseSearchBar: No selected radio stations, use search bar below to add radio stations.
noRadioStationsFoundTryAnOtherSearchTerm: No radio stations found, try an other search term.
searchingFailedNoConnectionToInternet: Searching failed, no connection to internet.
tapOnAnyElementToActivateSpeech: Нажать на любой элемент для активации вывода речи
encryptingAndSavingGrids: Шифрование и сохранение в базу данных
errorPlayingYoutube: Ошибка при воспроизведении видео YouTube. Пожалуйста, проверьте подключение к Интернету.
accessKey1NavigationAccessKey2Main: Ключ доступа 1: Навигация, ключ доступа 2: Главная
newVersionAvailableTheNextTimeYoullUseUp: Доступна новая версия! При следующем запуске AsTeRICS Grid вы будете автоматически использовать обновленную версию.
byDefaultSearchesForRadioStationNameAdva: по умолчанию ищет название радиостанции, возможен расширенный поиск, например, тэг: джаз, язык: русский или страна: Россия
thisActionAddsXNewElements: Это действие добавляет {0} новые элементы в сетку. Продолжить?
theSelectedFileDoesNotContainDict: Выбранный файл не содержит данных словаря.
couldNotDownloadDictCheckInternet: Could not download dictionary, please check internet connection.
doYouReallyWantDeleteAllGrids: Do you really want to delete all grids? This operation cannot be undone!
doYouReallyWantResetGlobalGrid: Do you really want to reset the global grid to default?
clearAllAndImportFromFile: Clear all and import from file
doYouReallyWantDeleteAllImages: Do you really want to delete all images and symbols from all grids? This cannot be undone.
theInitialDevelopmentOfAstericsGridWasDo: The initial development of AsTeRICS Grid was done at the UAS Technikum Wien within the project ToRaDes, funded by the city of Vienna (project number 18-04).
currentDeleopmentAstericsGridIsDoneWBT: Current development of AsTeRICS Grid is done in the project "Knowledge Hub for Accessible Technologies" (WBT), funded by the city of Vienna (project number 26-02).
astericsGridIsFreeAndOpenSource: AsTeRICS Grid is free and open source and hosted on github.com.
ifYouEncounterAnErrorHaveSuggestions: If you encounter an error, have suggestions for improvement or any general feedback please don't hesitate to contact us:
termsOfServiceAndPrivacyPolicy: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
astericsGridLicenseInfo: AsTeRICS Grid is free and open source software. It's licensed under the {agplLink}, which in ensures it will stay open source forever.
ytTermsInfo: If you want to use the integrated YouTube player, you have to agree to the {ytTerms} and the {googleTerms}. All entered search queries for YouTube videos are sent to the {ytAPI} in order to retrieve and play video results.
privacyPolicyInfo: Единственное потенциально значение личных данных, обрабатываемых в системе AsTeRICS Grid — это имя пользователя онлайновых пользователей. Все остальные данные либо хранятся локально, либо в виде сквозного шифрования и, следовательно, читаются только пользователями. Дополнительную информацию можно найти в {privacyPolicy}.
thankBrowserstack: Благодарим {browserstackUrl} за предоставление бесплатного UI теста на их платформе.
thankResponsiveVoice: Мы благодарим {responsiveVoiceUrl} за бесплатное некоммерческое использование.
youreUsingAstericsGridVersion: Вы используете версию {gridVersion} для AsTeRICS Grid.
ifYouNeedHelpWithinAstericsGrid: Если вам нужна помощь в AsTeRICS, Grid, просто нажмите на иконку справки ({openHelpIcon}) или нажмите [F1] на клавиатуре, чтобы открыть пользовательскую документацию в соответствующей части.
aLocalUserIsStoredOnlyOnThisDevice: Локальный пользователь хранится только на этом устройстве, в этом браузере. Если вы хотите настроить пользователя, который синхронизирован между несколькими устройствами с помощью облака, вы можете зарегистрировать пользователя онлайн.
noActionsDefinedClickOnAdd: Действия не определены, нажмите на "{addAction}", чтобы добавить.
thisElementAlreadyNavigatesToAnotherGrid: This element already navigates to another grid. This navigation will be overwritten.
noElementsClickToEnterEdit: Нет элементов, нажмите {link}, чтобы войти в режим редактирования.
thanksToHermitDaveForSupplyingDataForThi: Thanks to Hermit Dave for supplying data for this dictionary on
changeToLatestToOpen: Change to {latestLink} to open this user.
gridsCanBeTranslatedToEveryLanguage: Grids can be translated to every language. To add or edit a translation use "Edit grid -> More -> Translate Grid".
theOnlyPersonalDataSavedIs: The only potentially personal data that is saved unencrypted is your username. All other data will be end-to-end encrypted cannot be accessed by anyone else. The consent can be revoked at any time by sending an email to {link}. Revocation does not affect the legality of data processing that has taken place before.
ifTheTranslationForYourLanguageIsNotAvai: If the translation for your language is not available or has errors, please contribute on the translation platform {crowdin}.
useHorizontalScrollbarIfElementsDontFit: Use horizontal scrollbar if elements don't fit (otherwise multiple lines)
addThisElementToCollectionElementsDespit: Add this element to collection elements despite navigating
factorForFontSizeOfOnlytextElements: Factor for font size of only-text elements in separated mode
convertUppercaseKeyboardLettersToLowerca: Convert uppercase keyboard letters to lowercase
activateColorCategoriesOfGridElements: Activate color categories of grid elements
generalSettingsAreAppliedToAllUsersOnThi: General settings are applied to all users on this device.
userSettingsAreLinkedToTheCurrentUser: User settings are linked to the current user and are synchronized to other devices (only for online users).
disableColorCategoryToEnableCustomColor: Disable color category to enable custom color
updateGridThumbnailsConfirm: In order to update the thumbnails all grids will be opened shortly. Continue?
aragoneseCenterOfAAC: Aragonese Center of Augmentative and Alternative Communication (ARASAAC)
arasaacCollaboration: Since 2022 AsTeRICS Grid is collaborating with the {arasaacLink}. Their practice-oriented feedback makes it possible for AsTeRICS Grid to evolve into a full-fledged AAC application - thanks!
copyrightARASAACPDF: Pictograms by Sergio Palao, ARASAAC, https://arasaac.org, CC (BY-NC-SA)
searchFailedMaybeNotConnectedToInternet: Search failed, maybe not connected to internet?!
LANG_EXPORT_ALL: Export all languages available in the grid(s)
importUserSettings: Import user settings and input config
doYouWantToDeleteBeforeImporting: Do you really want to delete all existing grids and dictionaries before importing the new ones? This cannot be undone!
exportUserSettingsAndInputConfig: Export user settings and input config
emptyConfigToCreateAnything: Start with empty configuration in order to create any content by yourself.
author: Author
ifYouWantToSupportTheDevelopmentOfAsteri: If you want to support the development of AsTeRICS Grid or contribute to the costs for running the server/database for syncronization you''re very welcome to donate to the AsTeRICS Foundation
theFollowingRessourcesForHelpOnAstericsG: The following ressources for help on AsTeRICS Grid are available
directlySelectElementOnPressingMouseButt: Directly select element on pressing mouse button (not waiting for complete click)
selectWithDoubleClickOrDoubleTap: Select with double click (or double tap)
enableAcousticFeedbackUsingBeepingSounds: Enable acoustic feedback using beeping sounds
readElementActionsInAdditionToLabel: Read element actions in addition to label
minimumPauseForCollectingAndSpeakingTheS: Minimum pause for collecting and speaking the same cell several times in a row
backupFileDoesntContainData: Backup file doesn't contain grid configuration!
pleaseAllowAccessingMicrophoneInOrderToR: Please allow accessing microphone in order to record audio
selectedAudioFileIsTooBig: The selected audio file is too big, only short samples up to about 10 seconds are allowed
recordedAudioIsOnlyPlayedWithCollectElem: Recorded audio is only played with collect element actions in mode "speak separately"
setActionsOfGlobalGridToModeSpeakSeparat: Set actions of global grid to mode "speak separately"
speakActionsOfGlobalGridWereSetToModeMod: Speak actions of global grid were set to mode mode "speak separately"
generalSupportSocialMedia: For general support and questions please send us a message at the {instagramLink} or the {facebookLink}
foundBugReportGithubIssue: If you found a bug or have a feature request, please {githubLink}
discussIdeasGithubDiscussions: To discuss ideas for upcoming features, share usage examples or get in contact with other users, please {githubLink}
specialRequestsSendEmail: For other requests, you can also contact us by email: {foundationEmail}
linkVoiceLanguageToTranslationLanguageOf: Link voice language to translation language of spoken text
pleaseConsiderToDownloadABackup: Please consider to download a backup of your configuration in order to be safe of not loosing your work.
intervalForRemindingMakeBackups: Interval for reminding to make backups
activateAutomaticGrammarCorrectionARASAA: Activate automatic grammar correction via ARASAAC's API (available for: {availableLangs})
noteThatActivatingThisSendsSentencesToAR: Note that activating this feature results in sending all constructed sentences to ARASAAC's natural language API. See {link}.
thanksToEduardoLleidaSolanoProfessorAtDe: Thanks to Eduardo Lleida Solano, Professor at the Department of Electronic Engineering and Communications of the University of Zaragoza for collaborating in the development of the ARASAAC API that integrates Natural Language Processing (NLP). It's used to provide a feature to automatically fix the grammar of sentences within AsTeRICS Grid.
couldntPlayWebradioBecauseTheBrowserDidn: Couldn't play webradio, because the browser didn't allow it.
startManuallyByUserInputEvent: Start manually by user input event
navigateToHomeGridAfterSelectingAnElemen: Navigate to home grid after selecting an element
notShowingAllResultsTryALongerSearchTerm: Not showing all results. Try a longer search term.
dontAddElementToCollectElement: Don't add element to collect element
doYouReallyWantDeleteExistingWordForms: Do you really want to delete all existing word forms and replace them by the content of the clipboard?
doYouReallyWantDeleteAllWordForms: Do you really want to delete all existing word forms?
clipboardContainsNoWordFormsPleaseCopyFr: Clipboard contains no word forms, please copy from any spreadsheet with 1-3 columns: (1) value, e.g. "are", (2) optional language code, e.g. "EN", (3) optional word form tags, e.g. "1.PERS, PLURAL".
WORDFORM_MODE_CHANGE_ELEMENTS: Change word form in grid elements
WORDFORM_MODE_CHANGE_BAR: Change word form in collection element
WORDFORM_MODE_NEXT_FORM: Change this element to next word form
toggleTagOnSelectingItMultipleTimes: Toggle tags on selecting it multiple times
infoPleaseDefineAHomeGridInManageGrids: Info: please define a home grid in "Manage grids -> Home grid" in order to reliably show correct paths.
toggleInCollectionElementIfAddedMultiple: Toggle in collection element if added multiple times
cacheAllTextsOfCurrentConfigurationExter: Cache all texts of current configuration using external voice
uartActionFailedConnection: UART action failed, couldn't open connection!
copyDirectLinkToConfigToClipboard: Copy direct link to this configuration to clipboard
usersWillBeDeletedAfterNotLoggingInFor36: Users will be deleted after not logging in for 365 days, so please create backups of important configurations.
useDictionaryOfCurrentContentLanguage: Use dictionary of current content language
